Title: Slacking and Sledding
Description:
As you may know, the children of Iskaara are fiercely independent. They learn from a young age to fend for themselves.

It's a rite of passage for many of the older kids to sneak off to the iceberg southeast of here. Kiopo, the eldest of our children, is out there right now. Tell him I sent you, and he should offer you one of our sleds!

Ah, that reminds me of my younger days... out there with my friends...
ObjectivesText: Seek out Kiopo on the island to the southeast.
